item.title: Fashion recognition
item.description: During quarantine, some friends and me decided to tackle a exciting project. It was centered around training a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to recognize certain fashion articles in Instagram pictures. The final goal was to find relevant posts from influencers and create a keyword which potentially generates more traffic the next days and can be used for GoogleAdWords Marketing. item.title: About
item.description: My name is Chris (actually Christoph, but just call me Chris) and I warmly welcome you on my website. If I had to summarize in one sentence who I am, I would describe myself as someone who is driven by a strong passion for learning & utilizing the newest technologies (it is crazy what is currently happening out there), while on the other hand trying to retain balance in the fast-paced environment of our today’s world.

item.title: Life (Curriculum Vitae)
item.description: If you look it up on Wikipedia, Curriculum Vitae loosely translates from Latin as course of life. As Wikipedia continues to know, it usually rather refers to the complete record of someone’s career. However, as work is an important part of our lifes, for this page I will refer back to this original meaning. By doing so I will reach beyond the limitations of a CV and express the course of my life by trying to draw a more whole picture - including the important stations and shaping moments of in my life.

item.title: My experience with Working Out Loud (WOL)
item.description: During my last internship, I got to learn a lot of awesome things. Besides slide-building and clear communication, I was exposed to the Working Out Loud (WOL) method by John Stepper. WOL is a method, where a few people come together to form a so-called circle.

item.title: Learning phase transitions with Machine Learning
item.description: The first principal component shows hifh correlation with the order parameter. Background This project is concerned with the work of my Bachelor’s thesis. During the four months, I investigated the phase transition of the Ising model with machine learning and applied the same methodology to another statistcal model. Hereby, apart from a pratical course during the studies, I had never worked with machine learning before, so this was a great opportunity to dig deeper into the topic.
